text.text: Thank you for reading 'A Tinkers Compendium' Unfortunatly the Royal~Jelly has scribbled on the pages.
This book contains all the nessecary information related to Lance-kuns Tools, Armors, Materials, Modifiers.
Crafting a simple set of armor is easy, begin With crafting an armor station, stencil table, and part table. all of which are nessecary if you want to progress into real smithing ~
